resources.string: it collapses and expands the detail setting menu
you can set a range of interest with this
Please select a pseudo-random number generation method.
What is a range of value you are interested with?
How many test case should I run at once for mass case mode?
number of operation per mass case run
First, select your desired pseudo-random number generation (PRNG) method.
If the PRNG method you want to use is not included in this app, email me with brief explanation of that method. I will add those.
If you know the PRNG method of your target of application (eg. hextech box of LoL), please select that. Otherwise, choose any of your desire. It may affect the result.
You can collapse or expand this settings menu freely if it disturbs you seeing the result.
When you press \'try one\' button, you can try your luck of right at this moment. The result of these will be framed so that you can distinguish.
When you press \'mass case\' button, the lucktest will be operated for an amount of times you set.
When you long press the result, you can see several important values. It can include what value you got, the range of value it had to enter, and by what mode it was operated.
